game_description: Featuring Ciri as the main protagonist, this new chapter in the Witcher universe is highly anticipated.
A co-op multiplayer spin-off set in the Elden Ring universe.
A new entry in the Onimusha series, exploring the early Edo period.
Set in 1900s Sicily, this game delves into the origins of organized crime.
The next installment of the popular Final Fantasy series, continuing the story of Cloud Strife and his allies.
An open-world RPG set in the Star Wars universe, where players can explore different planets and interact with iconic characters.
A new fantasy RPG from Obsidian Entertainment, set in the Pillars of Eternity universe.
The follow-up to the critically acclaimed roguelike game, continuing the story of the Underworld with new characters.
A psychological action game that continues the journey of Senua through Norse mythology.
The latest entry in the Dragon Age series, promising a darker narrative with deep RPG elements.
